title: Riot mod dude
body: Why did you delete my thread man :/ come on dude I thought you loved me as much as I love you :/

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVrHdA3h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-26T04:57:54.942+0000)
>
> What thread was this?

A thread talking about white culture

LOL. why would riot care about people though? they only want your money. why do you think they've allowed the most toxic of trolls in the world to continue playing their game for over 5 whole years? cos they're the only ones that care about buying skins to make themselves look cooler to the public so they feel entitled enough to make fun of everyone else and disrupt their gameplay

But... Why?

Don't they know that these white men are dangerous?
